natural solution: Since $7^2 = 49$, it follows $\log_x 49 = 2$. Writing this equation in exponential notation gives $x^2 = 49$.
Solving this gives $x = \pm 7$, but the base of a logarithm cannot be negative, so $x = \boxed{7}$.
